response.overview: Return "is a story about the price of revenge for the damage that it causes the person chosen to take on his way to the power of love - the only escape from the ghosts of the past and hope for a new beginning and new life.     The main hero Alexander Georgiev is a bank employee whose family was killed in an accident through the fault of an influential businessman. After the incident, Alexander was in a coma, during which things are arranged so that it becomes the main culprit for the tragedy. After a noisy process Alexander was sentenced to longer prison. When comes the end of his sentence, his life is completely shattered, but possessing only one thought - to take revenge on those responsible ...
response.title: Payoff
